price: (Allāhu) sọ pé: “’Iblīs, kí l’ó kọ̀ fún ọ láti forí kanlẹ̀ kí ohun tí Mo fi ọwọ́ Mi méjèèjì dá? Ṣé o ṣègbéraga ni tàbí o wà nínú àwọn ẹni gíga?”
arabic: قَالَ يَٰٓإِبۡلِيسُ مَا مَنَعَكَ أَن تَسۡجُدَ لِمَا خَلَقۡتُ بِيَدَيَّۖ أَسۡتَكۡبَرۡتَ أَمۡ كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡعَالِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla yāib'līsu mā manaʿaka an tasjuda limā khalaqtu biyadayya astakbarta am kunta mina al-ʿālīna
